ai-ja201:1.1_0: “The wise say that shackle is not strong
ai-ja201:1.2_0: that’s made of iron, wood, or knots.
ai-ja201:1.3_0: * impassioned and excited they seek out
ai-ja201:1.4_0: concern for your partners and children:
ai-ja201:2.1_0: that bondage is strong say the wise,
ai-ja201:2.2_0: which cast off the cold, soft, hard to escape.
ai-ja201:2.3_0: having cut this away the wise proceed,
ai-ja201:2.4_0: unconcerned, having given up sensual pleasures.”
